mean_en: a hypothetical former large continent from which other continents are held to have broken off and drifted away
word_etyma: super 超级 + con 共同，全部 + tin=hold握，持 + ent 名词后缀 → super+continent共同持有的=大陆 → 超大陆
short_phrase: Earth used to be made up of one supercontinent.
sentence: Earth used to be made up of one big supercontinent, rather than seven smaller continents.
sentence_trans: 我们的土地曾经只有一个超级大陆，而不是七个稍微小些的大陆。
